<ce:para id="para0010" view="all">Glycylglycine (10 mmol), 2-hydroxyacetophenone (10 mmol) and KOH (10 mmol) were dissolved and refluxed in MeOH/H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (v:v=1:1) for half an hour. Cu(OAC)<ce:hsp sp="0.12"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.12"></ce:hsp>H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (10 mmol) was then added to the solution and the resulting solution was adjusted to the pH 9–10. At last BaCl<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>
<ce:hsp sp="0.12"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.12"></ce:hsp>2H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (5 mmol) was added. The violet precipitate was obtained, which can be recrystallized from hot water (90 °C). The filtrate was allowed to evaporate slowly at room temperature. After several days violet red crystals, which were suitable for X-ray diffraction, were obtained.<ce:footnote id="FN2">
<ce:label>2</ce:label>
<ce:note-para>
<ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">24</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">30</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">12</ce:inf> Cu<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>Ba: C, 34.69; H, 3.61; N, 6.74%. IR (KBr; cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3442s, 1655s, 1609s, 1340m, 1297m. ESI-MS (<ce:italic>m</ce:italic>/<ce:italic>z</ce:italic>): 310.1, [CuL]<ce:sup loc="post">−</ce:sup>. Yield, 75%. Found: C, 34.58; H, 3.61; N, 6.66%.</ce:note-para>
</ce:footnote>

</ce:para>
clean_text: Glycylglycine (10 mmol), 2-hydroxyacetophenone (10 mmol) and KOH (10 mmol) were dissolved and refluxed in MeOH/H2O (v:v=1:1) for half an hour. Cu(OAC)⋅H2O (10 mmol) was then added to the solution and the resulting solution was adjusted to the pH 9-10. At last BaCl2 ⋅2H2O (5 mmol) was added. The violet precipitate was obtained, which can be recrystallized from hot water (90 °C). The filtrate was allowed to evaporate slowly at room temperature. After several days violet red crystals, which were suitable for X-ray diffraction, were obtained. 2  Anal. Calc. for C24H30N4O12 Cu2Ba: C, 34.69; H, 3.61; N, 6.74%. IR (KBr; cm-1): 3442s, 1655s, 1609s, 1340m, 1297m. ESI-MS (m/z): 310.1, [CuL]-. Yield, 75%. Found: C, 34.58; H, 3.61; N, 6.66%.
